text: aur ( jab ve jaane lage) to us (pita) ne kahaah he mere putro! tum ek dvaar se misr mein pravesh na karana, balki vibhinn dvaaron se pravesh karana aur main tumhen kisee cheez se nahin bacha sakata, jo allaah kee or se ho aur aadesh to allaah ka chalata hai, mainne useepar bharosa kiya tatha useepar bharosa karane vaalon ko bharosa karana chaahie
